channel.title: Cache location problem
channel.description:
What's wrong with this code?
[CODE]/* OPTION 4 */private String cacheDir = {System.getProperty("user.home") + "/EmpsRemake/" }; // Local link to cache directory - Same as sign.signlink.findcachedir() - Remember trailing '/' [/CODE]

item.title: Cache location problem
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

What does it say? Does it just not load your cache? Be sure to place it in your user home (in windows, something like C:/Users/jullul/, or in linux /home/ ?).

Read full topic
